title: GINI Index for Russia and the UK

content.question: Respond to all parts of the question: Using the data in the graph, describe the GINI Index for the United Kingdom in 2004. Using the data in the graph, describe a trend in the data for Russia. Describe what the GINI Index measures. Using the data in the graph, draw a conclusion about inequality in Russia. Explain a consequence sometimes associated with inequality and economic liberalization for authoritarian regimes.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question: Using the data in the graph, describe the GINI Index for the United Kingdom in 2004. unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
